bow: rant on pack and plays not being guaranteed at hotels every hotel ve stayed in days pack and plays are guaranteed that you can only request them get it you have limited number of pack and plays the rationale im given is that they give them out on first come first served basis but you also have limited number of rooms and beds if you have five rooms and five people make reservation for particular night you would rent sixth room to sixth person online if you have five pack and plays and six people request them when they make their reservation for given night you should allow the sixth person to complete the reservation with the pack and play request there is simply no reason why you ca track the availability of pack and plays the same way you track the availability of rooms and beds the concept is the same if you do have anywhere for me to sleep ca stay in your hotel and if you do have anywhere for my baby to sleep ca stay in your hotel not cosleeping with my toddler on bed four feet off the ground and prefer not to put her on the floor either we are paying for room we can all sleep in why is this so hard babies and toddlers need beds the same way adults need beds you never tolerate it if you showed up at the hotel and they said yes we have room for you but unfortunately all the beds are taken so we do have bed for you ffs ve surprisingly never had this issue and we stay in hotel about once month would go mental if it did happen though have month old there is no safe solution if they don have crib always call to book though which makes me feel more reassured they have crib ve never had an issue with actually getting one but they always tell me it not guaranteed so always have contingency plan to run to wal mart or somewhere nearby to buy one if we have to or if we re driving ll sometimes take ours with us but for real wtf why not just keep track of availability the best could get this time is leaving my number with request that they please call me if the pack and plays run out so know ahead of time feel ya like they have your credit card number so why can they reserve crib the same way they do with room 🤷‍♀️ removed from reading an ama while back hotels routinely overbook rooms and other amenities it frustrating for sure if you would be willing to pay an extra fee for the pack play sure they would start tracking inventory they are offering these things for free if you need one bring one otherwise you are not guaranteed one it the same everywhere unbelievable this travel lot 5times year for the last years with my kids and have always brought my own there no telling how clean the random ones at hotels are anyways they could be full of feces or cold germs and not taking that chance just eww even if fly bring one because southwest lets you check stroller or pack play for free when traveling with child it easy to say that you can track something like pack play but it is much harder to actually do rooms are easier to track because they don move they don get stolen they don get handed over to the wrong person they don need to be stashed somewhere until they can be cleaned they don get put in closet and forgotten about for week think of it this way what would make you more angry being told you might get one and you don or being told you will get one and you don guess which situation hotel would rather deal with it like asking restaurant to track every potato so if you order baked potato they can always immediately guarantee they have exactly the right amount of potatoes source worked in hotels for years unless you re hospitality tools program developer it hard to say you can just add whole new booking system on top of their existing booking system it clearly not in demand enough or the functionality and procedure would be better streamlined in the system when we travel we pack bed railing with us that fits on checked bag definitely not carry on but that has worked for us also our stroller fully reclines flat so if worse comes to worse they can also sleep in the stroller laying fully flat and strapped in so they can roll out it also why we ve started staying in airbnb too when traveling with kids and only booking kid friendly spaces yeah was thinking it probably is that easy yep my mom manages hotel and they routinely overbook because people are flaky they often cancel at the last second or do bother cancelling at all and just wo show up if they do have everyone show up for their reservations they are partnered with nearby hotels and will transfer them elsewhere actually place stayed at charged for the pack play and it still wasn guaranteed plus they can charge for the baby as an extra occupant regardless of whether they provide the baby place to sleep so no it not free pack plays are also not always feasible to bring if you re traveling by air and renting vehicle you may not have the space to bring one they aren exactly small after working at hotel will never allow my baby to use hotel pack and play they are disgustingly dirty they re free so you can expect them flew to vacation with my grandparents when my son was small and they told me no worries we have pack play for him since they were also traveling to meet us was stunned this was something they got special for us not something they just kept on hand at their house amp x200b was so impressed they would be so thoughtful get there and yep shiny new pack and play so sweet he sleeps in it few nights and it time to go home grampa is driving me to the airport and says throw the pack play in the car confused asked why need to stop at the target and return it on the way back he called it corporate rental buys baby gear returns he was like the unethical life protip master king this is not an endorsement of this practice just sharing his workaround well need bed and toilet when travel but sort of expect when the hotel says they have those available that do need to bring one until you re in philly for wedding and all the rooms in radius are also booked and then they tell you oh well sleep in your car oh and when you call customer service they tell you you re being unreasonable and they ca accommodate you at any hotels it so cool when hotels do that the point is you are the parent you need to provide what your child needs if they are guaranteed and run out of them run out to wal mart and pick one up you can fly with pack play did it for years twice month and never had an issue some airlines charge and some do rent larger vehicle that has plenty of room you need to do what you need to do in order to provide for your child do get mad at the hotel because they ran out of something that was guaranteed my thoughts exactly personally want to bring my own anyways because of germs they change the bed sheets but highly doubt they scour and sanitize pack and play yes but they guarantee those not every hotel charges for pack play if they were guaranteed one it would be different story ewwwww would never use hotels pack and play couldn imagine how nasty they truly are bring your own then you know if it actually properly clean and disinfected removed these days you ca be sure the last kid that slept in those things had been exposed to measles do think let me kids sleep in hotel pnp anymore get your frustration though this reminds me of our first vacation after our child came home we adopted through foster care and the child was still pre adoption when we flew across the country and stayed at quaint cottage we called to make sure they had pack and play and were told yep no problem arrived and they had no idea where it was or who had promised it we were legally bound to certain stipulations due to the child being ward of the state at that time one of the rules was to not allow the child who was 18 months at the time to sleep in our bed or anywhere not designed for child that age the cottage owners were amazing and drove into the next town to buy pack and play for our use hope they were able to allow many guests in the time since to use it as well or the room that has one decided to stay an extra day what are they going to do take it away haven had to travel with my baby yet but just searched walmart pack plays and the cheapest is literally 30 feel like that small price to pay to not have to travel with your own and guarantee that it clean just leave it behind at the hotel for that price you may end up having to pay fee anyway if you say you are bringing baby when you reserve the room haven had to travel with my baby yet but just searched walmart pack plays and the cheapest is literally 30 feel like that small price to pay to not have to travel with your own and guarantee that it clean just leave it behind at the hotel for that price you may end up having to pay fee anyway if you say you are bringing baby when you reserve the room not sure if this would work for you but maybe start looking for rooms that include pull out couch the last big trip we took we had one and our then 3yo liked it and it was much lower to the ground so think it could be an okay option for toddler or one of the rooms that reserved one decided not to use it they tell they ca have it so does book with them but oops they do have one that lost sale for them for anyone not aware you can rent baby gear from private companies and then your reservation is guaranteed and ime the gear is in much better condition because that their entire business we always rent full sized cribs on vacation it is little pricey if you re only staying somewhere one night but for more than few nights it worth it 100 just google your destination baby gear rental assuming you have one child have trust me max out the allowance of things you can pack with you on the plane usually car seat and stroller checked plus have to drive van still not always room for strollers luggage and multiple pack plays all that was asked was for the ability to reserve pack play 🤷🏼‍♀️ we have travelled lot with our kids especially airplane trips and we have the guava family travel crib can not recommend it enough it comes in bag that converts to backpack and only weighs 13 pounds way lighter than pack and play and always know my kids will have safe place to sleep totally worth it for us with how much use we have gotten out of it why ca they guarantee them though buy toddler cot amazon sells them so does walmart that what we did for our kids they roll up small they are easy to set up and they are close to the ground in case they fall off though my kids never did my kids both slept on them when we traveled and now that they are older upgraded to adult cots they are the best even if you re flying they fit easily in small suitcase in their own travel bag because they would have to have one for every room why can they give everyone private hot tubs or more simply why can they guarantee roll away availability pack and play is not the same as an adult bed it portable small and you can buy your own imagine moms group of 50 moms comes to the hotel each with children and they all request pack and plays they aren guaranteed the hotel would have been obligated to provide them 100 pack and plays similarly if they guaranteed roll away beds imagine field trip came through with kids to room the hotel would need hundreds of roll away beds to accommodate for my high school field trips you could share bed or sleep on the floor this is incredibly trashy op please don do this had to do this after the car seat my in laws had was found to be as old as me idk what they were thinking know you re being hyperbolic but it funny to think about bed that literally four feet tall that being said have flown solo many times with my infant so know the feeling re not enough hands when traveling the answer to that is to use carts at the airport and check everything you can check travel crib for free work in hotel and they are definitely not guaranteed with 400 rooms at my hotel we only have two pack and plays bring my own every time we travel my son is one and seriously thinking about buying one it nightmare haha because hotels often have minifridges extra safes microwaves rollaway beds and ton of other things that can be requested so it basically impossible to maintain an accurate inventory we did this when we took my to disney the pull put is only about foot and half off the ground and we used the cushions from the couch as extra cushion on the ground in case she rolled off think they should have 100 pack and plays for the 23ish paid for each one it so worth it before the cots also had little pop up tents so could zip them in and keep them safe and from crawling around it was called the kidco peapod bought it on amazon had of them kids are 14 months apart and they were the best when kids were in the 18 month range if remember correctly byopnp second this for major cities however not in smaller country areas you can also rent packs of whatever your baby needs at the car seat cot and high chair phase just rented for three days and it cost 30 which is 30 happily pay to save the stress of flying with that kit travel lot at least once week by car or plane and when possible try to stay in family friendly airbnb which is usually child proof and has extras like toys pack and plays high chairs and baths is this an option for your destination in smaller country town motels and hotels have found they don have baby cots at all so hear your frustration prefer to bring our own cot if driving just so lo has familiar bed thank you removed your expectations are way too high this is courtesy not some mandated service hotels must provide plus would not be comfortable putting my baby to sleep in something like this you have no idea if some sick kid puked all over it few hours before it was given to you would suggest you move the bed to the wall if you can used to worked doing housekeeping in an hotel that had mostly parents and kids as guests and we usually had people do this also pack and plays are rarely cleaned could also suggest you could get rollaway bed and put it in place where you would feel comfortable to put your baby my last suggestion would be to find place to rent what you need instead of buying new one here we have local baby thrift store that rents out there equipment were worked they did have system to track down every single thing they gave out rollaways pack and plays extra blankets but sometimes people would steal them damage them and leave them unusable so we would ran out of them and had to offer other options sorry if you ever had an inconvenience same with regular beds though or library books playgrounds etc worked in restaurants for few years when the kitchen ran out of potatoes they write 86 potatoes in huge letters on the whiteboard in back and we immediately stop letting people order them co sleeping solves this problem also people not wanting to put toddlers inti regular beds astound me my daughter was neen in toddler bed without rail since 12 months when she could climb out of the cot and then in regular bed since years old she has rolled out if bed twice and tome did even wake up put pillow on the floor next to the bed if you are really worried about falling out of bed book regular bed for the kid and put the mattress directly on the floor my point was the idea of being able to track something online that is easy to miscount or lose like if someone ordered some potatoes in the morning for dinner then you had someone accidentally drop potato in the trash have to redo an earlier potato dish miscounted your potatoes etc hotels note in the back office when they run out of stuff like pack plays too in much the same way not great for little littles but once they re more mobile pool noodles have friend who swears by it she brings pool noodles in her suitcase she cuts them to put on sharp corners and puts them under the edge of the sheets on fold out bed as bumper and they re also fun in pools haha granted having bag full of pool noodles would take up bunch of room but they are light ve never had to do it cause my toddler thought my suggestion she sleep in cot while away was hilarious absolutely not will sleep in the middle of this king bed and somehow take up the entire thing did this for my son when he got his twin bed at it amazing it was just enough to stop him from rolling out while he got used to it and they are definitely fun to play with him and my husband will have noodle fights sometimes in my experience they definitely work totally understand your frustration and also agree with some of the other hotel workers on this post hotels have software systems that help keep track of the rooms and their status keeping an eye on pack and plays seems easier but it not guest can check out of the room and leave the pack in play in there and the front desk attendant wouldn know that until after that specific room was cleaned inspected and the pack and play was brought down to the office there are many other scenarios but also agree with someone else on this post about staying away from them completely worked in hotel recently and yes we did disinfect the pack and plays after use but it nothing industrial grade and these are being shared and moved from room to room and ours were stored on the floor underneath table comments like this made me realize how difficult my son is he would never be okay with being strapped into stationary stroller for longer than minutes on good day let alone sleep in it really it *astounds* you just because someone does something little different than you does mean they re wrong never said it was wrong just that it astounding to me like it was never something worried about at all and worried about plenty of things maybe keeping toddlers in cots is an american thing but it not as common where live every kid is different funny enough mine won sleep in cribs and pack and plays need to hold them until they fall asleep but thankfully they transfer well and seem to prefer the tighter space of stroller than crib that and cosleeping next to me with bed railing fair enough would personally never put my toddler in regular bed but know other people do it if it works for them that great just wanted to say that push the hotel beds up against the wall when travel with my co sleeping infant then just push it back where it was when go to check out
